Dear Friends:
Now that you have been able to read through the program planned for
the NAEB, Region III Conference, I*m sure that you will agree that

And remember, your registration fee of $8.00 includes a luncheon and
dinner on March 29, and a luncheon on March 30.
Cordially,
Bill Tomlinson
